title: Factory Coffee HQ / TasteSpace Co., Ltd.
description: Factory HQ A Modern Industrial-Style Coffee Shop and Office Redefining Functional Aesthetics Design Concept Inspired by industrial factory aesthetics, Factory HQ seamlessly merges raw materials with contemporary design elements. At its core is a centrally placed counter bar, engineered for efficient operations.
author: Miwa Negoro

title: Leit House / Schwartz and Architecture
description: Millions of years ago, the volcanoes of Sonoma Valley spewed hot magma across the landscape. As the lava quickly cooled, the eruption's gases became trapped, forming porous cavities instead of crystallizing into dense stone. These blackened rocks —rhyolite, basalt, andesite, and pumice—still dot the landscape today, surprising in their lightness despite all appearances.
author: Hadir Al Koshta
